originalText.text: This is an Amazing place for the children... Make you feel like family. Keeps us well informed of our childrens ups and what we can do to improve there downs. I would recomend this place to anyone. Its another family that helps your children blossom into an intelligent, intriguing, beautiful person ...

originalText.text:
It took me almost a year to write this, I had such mixed feelings about this school and was very angry at how my children had to depart.

As a former parent of this school as difficult as this is to admit, I wouldnâ€™t recommend this school. I tried, I had my children there for 3  years total, my daughter for a year,  my son was there for 3 years. She excelled, but he struggled so much in-spite of the teachers efforts. And unfortunately I donâ€™t think anyone actually cared in terms of the administrations. But I will say the teachers actually made genuine efforts to support what was in their control. Except one major issueâ€¦

One thing they did was not give him was special education services, and then lied. That I will never understand. I dealt with it all, until they attempted to mandate him to summer school notifying me in June and  knowing not providing him with his services. However even with that, I tried but the day the principal stooped down to my daughterâ€™s level to tell her about herself and delivery a message that was certainly meant for meâ€¦ I lost all respect for her and the efforts the school tried to make.I was approachable, thereâ€™s certain things that shouldnâ€™t be done.

I really do believe under different leadership the school can flourish. Thatâ€™s the only reason I gave 3 stars!

originalText.text: THIS SCHOOL IS HORRIBLE, TERRIBLE I WOULD NEVER RECOMMEND THIS SCHOOL TO A PARENT OR TEACHER. I TAUGHT SECOND GRADE FOR 6 WEEKS THERE AND I WAS BELITTLED, MY INTELLIGENCE WAS INSULTED BY THE PRINCIPAL AND THE ASSISTANT PRINCIPAL THE PRINCIPAL SAID TO ME IN A MEETING THAT THE REASON WHY A STUDENT HAD THE RIGHT TO STICK UP THE MIDDLE FINGER AT ME IS BECAUSE I HAVE POOR CLASSROOM MANAGEMENT SKILLS. LESSON PLAN WERE 25 LESSONS A WEEK MATH CURRICULUM STARTED SEPT 24,2023 READING AND WRITING CURRICULUM STARTED OCTOBER 10,2023 FOR INTELLECTUAL PREP THE PRINCIPAL WOULD BE IN ZOOM MEETINGS SHE SPEAKS TO ME BEHIND CLOSE DOORS LIKE  I STOLED HER MAN. CONSTANTLY MICRO MANAGED ME AND MADE ME FEEL SUPER UNCOMFORTABLE COMMUNICATION WAS HORRIBLE I GIVE THIS SCHOOL A NEGATIVE 0 OUT OF ZERO OH YEA THE PAY IS BASURA TOO.. IF YOU CHILD TO  FAIL BE MY GUEST BUT IF YOU WANT SUCCESS GO SOMEWHERE ELSE.

originalText.text: Storefront Academy is a reputable school. The academic curricula is designed to challenge student, but they go at a pace that is best for your child. All children are capable, you just need to find the right institution to challenge them yet fit their capabilities and that's exactly what Storefront Academy does. Lastly, majority of parents love the academic outcome this school provide our children.
